song.englishname: Shaoey And Her Dad Wish You A Merry Christmas

english.segment1: Steven Curtis Chapman says, Okay, are you ready? (Shaoey starts to sing; Steven interrupts) Woah! Would you wait for me, please? Okay, thank you very much! Alright, here we go. Ready? We .
english.segment3: We wish you a merry Christmas, We wish you a merry Christmas, We wish you a merry Christmas, And a happy New Year!
english.segment4: Steven: Merry Christmas everybody!. Shaoey: Merry Christmas!.
